1257570.name: Two Point Hospital Soundtrack
1257570.description:
Kick back with a beverage of your choice as you're whisked away to the colourful world of Two Point County.

This soundtrack contains all of the global megasmash records you know and love from Two Point Hospital, including two tunes that rocketed to #1 in the Two Point County charts. Yes, that's right: inspired hits from superstar Jasmine Odyssey, "Fish Whispers" and "Nice Smelling Face".

So find out for yourself why so many in the Two Point County record industry have described these hits as "seminal", "earth-shattering" and "time-transcending" by picking up the soundtrack today.
